animeDescription: Based on the game by Black Package.  Shinji Oura is a part-time launderer since one month. He's working for Asai Cleaning under Sayaka, a rather young widow.  While trying to gain the heart of his employer, Shin-chan doesn't miss an occasion to mess around with the housewives of his neighbourhood, especially with Marissa the hot chick from Bangkok!
animeStaff: [['Murakami Kotaro', ['Producer']], ['Raika Ken', ['Director', 'Episode Director']], ['Nakagawa Tatsuto', ['Sound Director']], ['Nishi Shigenari', ['Editing']]]
